name: Avoid Main Procedures having "SELECT * FROM ..." clause (PL1)
description: This rule searches all the PL1 Main Procedures (Programs) having "SELECT * FROM ..." clause.
output:
The report lists all PL1 Main Procedures  having "SELECT * FROM " clause.

It provides following information: 
- PL1 Main Procedures  full name
rationale:
You incur an extra CPU cost for passing the columns from DB2 to your application. But this is not the
only consideration, retrieving additional columns can cause an additional access to the data
pages instead of an index-only access, resulting in additional I/Os, accumulating higher CPU,
and elapsed time.
remediation: Limit the columns in your SQL select statements to those applications really needing it.
alternativeName: Avoid Main Procedures having "SELECT * FROM ..." clause (PL1)

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance
